snippet.title: Choose Your Weapon! - The Anacrusis Gameplay Trailer #2
snippet.description:
Grab your Blaster, your Pulse Rifle, or your SMD and crack that airlock door to take the fight back to the invading aliens! With massive hordes and over-the-top sci-fi weapons, The Anacrusis is ready for you. 

Wishlist on Steam: https://j.mp/theanacrusis All footage recorded from playtests with real players. Join the Discord and help us test the game! https://discord.gg/straybombay.
